title: 2x1! Vaulted Ceiling! Top Floor! Available This Week!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 943 Sq.
That's the Northwest spirit woven into our community.
Built by Stafford Homes, Kitsap County's largest, quality home builder, these comfortable, elegant apartment homes are constructed with beautiful, contemporary interiors that fit the way you live.

From the built-in microwave, full-size washer and dryer, high quality appliances and ample storage to each home's energy saving construction, our community's well-designed homes make your time and money work more efficient for you.
As a resident, you will enjoy the added pleasure provided by our complete recreation pavilion.
It's all included as part of our community's extraordinary Northwest lifestyle.

Minutes to the Hood Canal Bridge and the scenic adventure of the Olympic Peninsula, our community is also near shopping, schools, ferry transportation, historic downtown Poulsbo, beaches, boat launches and employment centers' you never have to travel far to pursue your plans.
The Northwest spirit is living at our community.
- Mantled wood burning fireplace with glass doors
- Twenty minutes to Bainbridge, Bremerton, and Kingston ferries, www.wsdot.wa.gov
- Northwest lodge with gas fireplace, television, kitchen and outdoor deck
- Close to major shopping and employment centers
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
